description: This is an abstract base class for mapping between entity objects and Data Transfer Objects (DTOs). It provides generic conversion methods for collections of entities and DTOs, facilitating reuse and simplifying object transformation logic in the application.

classes.name: BaseMapper
classes.description: An abstract generic mapper class to convert between entity objects and their corresponding DTOs, supporting collection conversion methods.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Abstract method to convert a DTO to an entity instance. Must be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Abstract method to convert an entity to a DTO instance. Must be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: convertToEntity(Collection<D> dto, Object... args)
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs into a collection of entities.

methods.name: convertToDto(Collection<E> entity, Object... args)
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities into a collection of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntityList
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs into a List of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoList
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities into a List of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntitySet
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs into a Set of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoSet
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities into a Set of DTOs.
